snippet: Pinchas Zukerman, the violinist and conductor, said on Monday that he would step down as music director of Ottawa’s National Arts Center Orchestra.
abstract: Pinchas Zuckerman says he will step down as music director of Ottawa's National Arts Center Orchestra at the end of his contract.
lead_paragraph: Pinchas Zukerman, the violinist and conductor, said on Monday that he would step down as music director of Ottawa’s National Arts Center Orchestra.

keywords.value: National Arts Center Orchestra of Canada
keywords.name: organizations
